official_title: Improving Well-Being for Individuals With Persistent Pain After Surgery for Breast Cancer, Lobular Carcinoma in Situ, or Ductal Carcinoma in Situ: A Randomized Clinical Trial That Compares Three Behavioral Intervention Strategies and Examines Psychological Factors as Drivers of the Continuing Burden of Persistent Pain
